TopicTitle: Game crashes with a particular craft

Articles.Content:
- KSP Version (no Steam): 

> from file "buildID.txt": 

build id = 008302015.04.26 at 19:45:40 CESTBranch: master

> from file "KSP.log": 

Kerbal Space Program - 1.0.0.830 (WindowsPlayer)

OS: Windows Vista Service Pack 2 (6.0.6002)

CPU: Intel® Core2 Duo CPU P8400 @ 2.26GHz (2)

RAM: 3070

GPU: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 (1146MB)

SM: 30 (Direct3D 9.0c [aticfx32.dll 8.17.10.1129])

RT Formats: ARGB32, Depth, ARGBHalf, RGB565, ARGB4444, ARGB1555, Default, DefaultHDR, ARGBFloat, RGFloat, RGHalf, RFloat, RHalf

- What Happens: game crashes.

- Mods / Add-Ons: no mods, all stock

- At [this link](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/3l32c6glzq5sg1f/AAC5CBYEeNHiaR99Ds51Gqata?dl=0) there are the files generated during the various crashes (zipped), the craft I was flying, the "output\_log.txt" file and the "KSP.log" file saved on April 29th at 23.45 (GMT+1), and the "DxDiag.txt" file.

Steps to Replicate:

1) Load the craft V-0002 and launch it.

2) Reverting the flight to the VAB (sometimes the first time, sometimes the second time), the game crashes.

Thank you for your help!
